bio: I have studied Computer Science at the Universita' degli Studi di Udine receiving my B.Sc. in 2013. In 2015, I have got my M.Sc. degree with 110/110 cum laude in the joint program between the Universita' degli Studi di Udine and the Alpen-Adria-Universit√§t Klagenfurt. In 2019, I sucessfully completed my PhD in Software Engineering under the supervision of Prof. Martin Pinzger with distinction. From 2016 to 2018, I was an active member of the IEEE Student Branch Austria for which I served as vice-chair. In December 2019, I joined Dynatrace as software engineer. Currently, I work with the OpenTelemetry project.
news: Our paper Verifying temporal specifications of Java programs has been accepted by Springer Software Quality Journal.
